content: this crochet cat mat pattern works up super quickly using size 6 bernat blanket yarn the alternating single and double_crochet give the mat a wonderful cobbled texture that your furry family member will love adding some tassels or fringe will add even more fun this pattern would be great for beginners it is a simple repeat it s also a great pattern for those who volunteer or work with animals who need something comfy to rest on it is a nice fast project that can be worked up quickly over and over finished size 13 x 20 materials size 6 yarn i used bernat blanket in country blue us p/ 11 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitches used chain chain fdc foundation double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet
